oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design and synthesis of hybrid cyclophanes containing thiophene and indole units via Grignard reaction, Fischer indolization and ring-closing metathesis as key steps
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
CHINNAM, AK
SHIRBHATE, ME
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: DIVERSITY-ORIENTED APPROACH
AMINO-ACID DERIVATIVES
OLEFIN METATHESIS
STRATEGIES
COMPLEXES
PEPTIDES
SYSTEMS
cyclophane
Grignard reaction
Fischer indolization
ring-closing metathesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We demonstrate a new synthetic strategy to cyclophanes containing thiophene and indole moieties via Grignard addition, Fischer indolization and ring-closing metathesis as key steps.
